name: Stolen Mushrooms
description:
There's no limit to the anger of a plucky frog. The mushrooms stashed for the winter are stolen by new forms of mutants. It is necessary to return all the supplies as soon as possible and with a calm soul wait for winter.

Stolen Mushrooms - a 2D platformer where you as a frog take revenge on the brazen mutants who stole your winter supplies, jumping through different levels and destroy enemies. Purchase everything you need in the in-game store and complete all levels. There should be only one left!

Game Features:
- Pixel-Art
- Music
- Many levels
- High Difficulty
